method.name: sessiongenerate
method.des: In order to interact with some web based parts of the site, such as the comment exporter, it is often useful to be able to generate a login cookie without having to actually post login information to the login.bml page. This mode will, with proper authentication, provide you with a session cookie to use for authentication purposes.
